entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow near noon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 4.
